text: Abdelkhader Houamel (August 17, 1936 – July 11, 2018) was an Algerian painter. He was born in N'Gaous. He was one of the founders of contemporary Algerian painting.L'art et le monde moderne de René Huyghe, Jean Rudel, Thérèse Burollet Between 1955 and 1960, Abdelkhader Houamel was an active member of the National Liberation Front as part of his socialist and anti-colonialist beliefs. ==References== ==Other websites== *Djazaires, Liberte news *L'expression News paper Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Painters from Africa Category:Algerian people
title: Abdelkhader Houamel
